ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Returns a region description from ds9.

DESC.PARA: Returns a region description from the imager - by default, ds9. The image_getregion() function accepts no arguments and returns as a string a description of all regions drawn in the current frame.
A description of the current region is returned, and assigned to a variable.
